title: Elsa Pataky rides BMX bike with kids for school run in Byron Bay
text:
She's normally flaunting her ripped body by the beach or dressed to the nines attending glamorous red carpet events.

But Elsa Pataky looked just like every other mum on Wednesday as she and her three kids rode BMX bikes to school in Byron Bay.

Looking visibly dressed down in a baseball shirt and brown cargo pants, the 43-year-old was every part of the doting mum as daughter India, 7, and twin sons Sash and Tristan, 5, rode alongside in matching bikes.

Super mum: Make-up free Elsa Pataky kept it casual in a yellow and white baseball shirt and brown cargo pants as she rode a BMX bike with her kids to school

Elsa looked naturally beautiful, going for a make-up free look, with her hair being messed up by the helmet.

She kept a close eye on her trio of children, who were all dressed in track pants, T-shirts with big school backpacks.

They all wore different coloured helmets but one of the twins opted for an adorable teddy bear helmet.

Safety first: She kept a close eye on the trio, who all wore different coloured helmets, with one of the twins wearing a teddy bear helmet

Getting some exercise: The kids, who all wore track pants, were overshadowed by their big back packs

A day earlier, the family showed off their adventurous side when they went dirt bike riding.

The actress shared photos and videos on Instagram, showing herself and the three kids riding around their sprawling Byron Bay property.

While Elsa's husband-of-nine-years, Chris Hemsworth, didn't appear in the videos, the Tidelands star seemed to be having a great time with the couple's kids struggling to keep up with their speed demon mum.

Adrenaline junkies: A day earlier, the family showed off their adventurous side when they went dirt bike riding around their sprawling Byron Bay property

A man - who sounded a lot like Chris, 36 - could be heard chuckling as he watched the young family race around on their bikes.

'Look at her, she's, like, the fastest... I wonder where they got the speed from?' he remarked with a laugh.

But while Elsa raced ahead of her kids, the protective mum regularly peered back to make sure they were all okay.

The family of five live full time in Byron Bay in their recently renovated $20 million mega mansion.
description: She's normally flaunting her ripped body by the beach or dressed to the nines attending glamorous red carpet events.
